alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Grady (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 06 at 3:19PM EDT until April 06 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... North central Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... Grady County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 319 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated a severe thunderstorm capable of producing quarter size hail and damaging winds in excess of 60 mph. This storm was located 8 miles north of Quincy, and moving east at 35 mph. * Locations impacted include... Cairo, Havana, Bainbridge, Whigham, Attapulgus, Climax, Capel, Darsey, Jamieson, Rocky Hill, Iamonia, Laingkat, Calvary, Princes Still, Peoples Still, Amsterdam, Branchville, Nickleville, Hinson and Dogtown.
info.instruction: Severe thunderstorms produce damaging winds, destructive hail, deadly lightning and very heavy rain. For your protection, move to an interior room on the lowest floor of your home or business. Heavy rains flood roads quickly so do not drive into areas where water covers the road.
